${ModID}:MirrorZone.NAME: Power of mirrors
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, you get a #pMirror #pMove card containing one of the enemy moves used in the previous turn. You draw #b1 less card in exchange.

${ModID}:Reflective.NAME: Reflective
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases the damage and #yBlock amount of #yMirror #yMove card by #b{0}.

${ModID}:Shattered.NAME: Shattered
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a #yMirror #yMove, loses #b{0}% of its HP, rounded up.
